c:capability.name: AOSmithWaterHeaterController
c:capability.c:description: Model of an AO Smith water heater controller.

c:attribute.name: updaterate
c:attribute.description: The rate in seconds of how often the water heater polls the platform.

c:attribute.name: units
c:attribute.description: The display unit of the temperation.

c:attribute.name: controlmode
c:attribute.description: This is the mode setting of the device, not whether or not it is actually heating the water at the moment.

c:attribute.name: leakdetect
c:attribute.description: Enable or disable leak detection. Or report that no sensor is present and force to disabled.

c:attribute.name: gridenabled
c:attribute.description: This device was originally destined for utilities, so if the grid is controlling your device, it means you are responding to commands over Wifi.

c:attribute.name: dryfire
c:attribute.description: Detects that a dry-fire condition was present

c:attribute.name: elementfail
c:attribute.description: Status of upper and lower elements

c:attribute.name: tanksensorfail
c:attribute.description: Status of uppwer and lower temperature sensors.

c:attribute.name: errors
c:attribute.description: Contains a map of device error codes to verbose, user-friendly definitions.

c:attribute.name: modelnumber
c:attribute.description: Model number as recorded on the heater's label

c:attribute.name: serialnumber
c:attribute.description: Serial number as recorded on the heater's label
